div.p: This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

ul.li:
Include these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-EntityCode
CodeDisplayDefinition
BLDPRDBlood ProductA manufactured product that is produced from the raw blood oi a donor with the intention of using it in a recipient transfusion.
Import all the codes that are contained in VaccineEntityType

description.value: A type of Administered Substance that is manufactured from raw organic or inorganic ingredients and used in the course of a patient's therapy.
